summary: The decompiled version accurately captures the original functionality. The while loop is converted to an equivalent for loop, variable names are simplified (loops → arg0), and numeric operations are expressed in hex notation (1 → 0x01). The core logic of incrementing a counter and looping is preserved. Minor differences include function visibility modifiers (payable added) and the contract name change, which do not affect functional behavior.
differences: While loop converted to for loop (functionally equivalent)
Function signature includes 'payable' modifier in decompiled version
License changed from UNLICENSED to MIT
